name: Sarah Thompson
next_activity_subject: Review contract terms for Bondi property
notes:
[2024-12-10] Called to discuss property valuation. Client is interested in the Bondi beachfront property but concerned about the price. Suggested we meet next week to review comparable sales.

[2024-12-05] Email exchange about investment opportunities in Mosman area. Client has $2M budget and looking for properties with good rental yield.

[2024-11-28] Meeting at office. Reviewed portfolio performance. Client happy with returns on Surry Hills property. Discussed tax implications of selling investment properties.

[2024-11-20] Site inspection at Beach Road property. Client loved the ocean views but wants to negotiate on price. Will prepare a comparative market analysis.

[2024-11-15] Initial inquiry about beachfront properties. Client looking to diversify portfolio with premium coastal real estate.
